name: CupriDyne® Clean Odor Eliminator
description: CupriDyne® Clean Odor Eliminator utilizing a proprietary blend of micronutrients that is highly effective against all organically derived odors. Sites with more confined areas to target and able to utilize misting systems, such as wastewater treatment plants, MRFs and transfer stations, can use CupriDyne Clean concentrated liquids through misting systems, providing an easy to use and highly cost effective solution that integrate into the current system.
